name: Devilled Eggs
description: Let’s get cracking on an egg-cellent adventure! These little pockets of pure deliciousness are the life of any party, the MVPs of potlucks, and the champions of finger food. With creamy centres, vibrant dill, and a hint of chipotle, these protein-packed appies will be a hit at your next gathering. Here's a tip: use the Muffin Maker for easy serving!

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix
Chipotle Aioli Mix or Buffalo Seasoning

preparation: Halve eggs lengthwise and carefully remove yolks.
In a bowl, mash yolks with a fork. Blend in mayonnaise, dip mix, aioli mix, and salt until well combined.
Spoon yolk mixture into egg white halves.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix
summary: The ultimate summer salad, just add a few simple ingredients to make the most delish potato salad with notes of dill and a hint of sweetness. Each jar makes 6 cups of creamy or vinaigrette-style dressing so you can easily feed a crowd at a backyard barbecue.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavour with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!
